title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Plate Tectonics Kid's Page
body: Plate Tectonics Kid's Page            Hello kids! I'm Lyle. I'm not as smart as some of my GEODETECTIVE friends, but I'm a hard worker. If you want to know more about me, see my biography. Hard work can be fun, especially when you are learning new things. If you want to learn more about plate tectonics, check out these Web sites:                   On the Move: Plate Tectonics and Continent Drift     Yahooligans: Plate Tectonics and Earthquakes       California Geological Survey: Egg Tectonics     Continent Drift and Plate Tectonics Theory       CyberSleuth Kids: Plate Tectonics     Google Kids and Teens: Plate Movements       Earth's Continental Plates     Surfing the Net with Kids: Plate Tectonics       Plate Tectonics for K to 12     The Science Spot             Click here to learn how to become an Official GEODETECTIVE member and get a cool patch.   GEODETECTIVE Home - Plate Tectonics Home Page Contact our Education Outreach Specialist here.
